actions.text: Select Committee on Intelligence. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Feinstein. With written report No. 113-233. Additional views filed.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 519.

official_title: An original bill to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 2015 for intelligence and intelligence-related activities of the United States Government, the Community Management Account, and the Central Intelligence Agency Retirement and Disability System, and for other purposes.
short_title: Intelligence Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2015

titles.title: Intelligence Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2015
Intelligence Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2015

An original bill to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 2015 for intelligence and intelligence-related activities of the United States Government, the Community Management Account, and the Central Intelligence Agency Retirement and Disability System, and for other purposes.
